item.title: diseases
item.description: Diseases Cackle Fever Source: SRD / Basic Rules This disease targets humanoids, although gnomes are strangely immune. While in the grips of this disease, victims frequently succumb to fits of mad laughter, giving the disease its common name and its morbid nickname: ‚Äúthe shrieks.‚Äù Symptoms manifest 1d4 hours after infection and include fever and disorientation.

item.title: Conditions
item.description: Conditions Blinded Source: SRD / Basic Rules A blinded creature can‚Äôt see and automatically fails any ability check that requires sight. Attack rolls against the creature have advantage, and the creature‚Äôs attack rolls have disadvantage.
